name: Jeremy Averill
bio:
AVERILL In loving memory of
William Malcolm (Joe) Averill
born 1912 died 1981
his wife Marion Cora Layton
born 1928 died 2009
f.s. Jeremy Averill
infant son of Don. & Lucy
May 6, 1975
